snippet: Trans fats and small businesses. Sheryl Sandberg shares a must-see video on sexism. The Washington, D.C. start-up scene is thriving. The Wahlberg family restaurant becomes a reality TV show.

headline.main: Today in Small Business: The Secrets of Sriracha
